title: Cabinet sub-committee for 21A
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Cabinet of Ministers has appointed a Sub Committee led by the Minister of Justice to prepare the draft of the 21st Amendment to the Constitution.
This decision was reached at the Cabinet meeting last night.
The Cabinet Sub Committee is tasked with preparing the 21st Amendment to the Constitution by studying the pros and cons of the 20th Amendment and the 19th Amendment to the Constitution.
The new Cabinet of Ministers met for the first time yesterday under the patronage of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
Minister Dr. Nalaka Godahewa was appointed as Cabinet Spokesperson, while Ministers Kanchana Wijesekara and Dr. Ramesh Pathirana were appointed as Joint Cabinet Spokespersons.
